questions.question: What is the Lunar New Year
questions.answer: Another name for Chinese New Year

questions.question: What are fireworks
questions.answer: Billions of these go up at 12am

questions.question: What is red
questions.answer: The color considered 'Lucky' and used in new years decorations

questions.question: What are red envelopes
questions.answer: Presents given by parents to their kids on New Years

questions.question: What is Reunion Dinner
questions.answer: The name of the meal eaten by families on New Years Eve

questions.question: What are firecrackers
questions.answer: Lighting these is believed to scare away evil

questions.question: What is the coming year
questions.answer: Visiting the hospital on New Years is considered to bring bad luck for this amount of time.

questions.question: What is black and white
questions.answer: These two colors should not be worn, because of mourning

questions.question: What is sweeping
questions.answer: This cleaning chore is considered bad luck on New Years

questions.question: What is giving gifts
questions.answer: This action can be lucky or unlucky based on the number and color.

questions.question: What are dumplings
questions.answer: This traditional food is believed to bring Wealth if eaten on the New Year.

questions.question: What is fish
questions.answer: This traditional food is believed to bring Prosperity if eaten on the New Year.

questions.question: What are noodles
questions.answer: This traditional food is believed to bring Longevity if eaten on the New Year.

questions.question: What are Sweet Rice balls
questions.answer: This traditional food is believed to bring Family Togetherness if eaten on the New Year.

questions.question: What are Rice Cakes
questions.answer: This traditional food is believed to bring higher income if eaten on the New Year.

questions.question: What is spring?
questions.answer: This season festival is associated with the lunar new year

questions.question: What is 3 billion
questions.answer: The average number of trips made related to lunar new year

questions.question: What is 15 days
questions.answer: The length of the New Year celebrations

questions.question: What are lanterns
questions.answer: This decoration symbolizes the last day of the festival

questions.question: The name of the second Festival that ends the new year
questions.answer: Lantern Festival

questions.question: What is red
questions.answer: To ward off bad luck during your zodiac animal year, people where this color of underwear

questions.question: What is clothing
questions.answer: Buying and using brand new of this is considered lucky.

questions.question: Candied Crab Apple
questions.answer: This treat is associated with Fall in America and Chinese New Year in China.

questions.question: What are dogs
questions.answer: The second day of the new year is considered the birth of all of this animal

questions.question: What are noodles
questions.answer: This food is not cut during new year to represent long life
